CustomField.formula: IF ( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Suspension_End__c ) ), Suspension_Start__c <= TODAY(), Suspension_End__c > TODAY() ), "Suspended", IF( Start_Date__c > TODAY(), "Not Started", IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Termination_Date__c ) ), Termination_Date__c < TODAY() ), "Inactive", IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( End_Date_Code__c ) ), End_Date_Code__c < TODAY() ), "Inactive", "Active" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status
